mission_overview.title: AI/DEV Lab Frontend Overhaul - Professional Customer Support Demo
mission_overview.description: Complete redesign and modernization of the AI/DEV Lab frontend interface, transforming it into a professional, enterprise-grade customer support demo application with advanced features and modern design system.
mission_overview.business_objective: Create a showcase-quality frontend that demonstrates AI/DEV Lab capabilities while providing a functional customer support demo platform.
success_criteria: Professional, modern UI design with enterprise-grade aesthetics
Responsive design that works on all devices
Interactive toggle switches and mode controls
Model configuration panel with sliders and presets
Enhanced chat interface with improved UX
Proper wireframing and grid system implementation
Smooth animations and professional visual effects

technical_requirements.design_system: CSS custom properties with comprehensive theming

completed_features.description: Blue gradient header with integrated toggle switches and branding
completed_features.technical_details: CSS gradients, flexbox layout, responsive design

completed_features.description: Professional toggle switches for QA Mode, AI Mode, and Human-like timing
completed_features.technical_details: Custom CSS, JavaScript event handling, accessibility features

completed_features.description: Improved chat layout with better spacing and visual hierarchy
completed_features.technical_details: Flexbox layout, improved spacing, professional styling

completed_features.description: Separate panel with sliders for Temperature, Max Tokens, and Top P
completed_features.technical_details: Grid layout, responsive design, interactive sliders

completed_features.description: Quick preset buttons for Conservative, Balanced, and Creative modes
completed_features.technical_details: JavaScript preset logic, local storage, visual feedback

completed_features.description: Professional grid layout with proper wireframing
completed_features.technical_details: CSS Grid, responsive breakpoints, mobile optimization

completed_features.description: Smooth entrance animations and hover effects
Professional color scheme, typography, and spacing
completed_features.technical_details: Design system, CSS variables, consistent theming

technical_architecture.css_structure: Modular CSS with design system variables
technical_architecture.performance_optimization: Efficient CSS, minimal JavaScript, optimized assets

shadows.properties: Box shadows with color and blur variations

Responsive design requires careful planning and testing
Professional animations enhance user engagement significantly
Grid systems provide excellent layout control and consistency
